cs155.jray

Class Scene3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs155.jray.Scene3D

  • public class Scene3D
extends java.lang.Object
    This represents a 3d scene that can be drawn on a Canvas3D object. It consists of an array of lights and a group of objects It also has an ambient light, a background color, and a camera object. REFACTOR -- We should rewrite this using ArrayLists!

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Color3D ambient
      this is the level and color of initial ambient light in the scene independent of the other lights in the scene
      Color3D backgroundColor
      this is the color of pixels whose rays hit no objects
      Camera3D camera
      this is the default camera
      int depth 
      Light3D[] light 
      int numLights 
      int numObj 
      Group3D objs
      Here we create the scene elements as instance variables
